page.title: 15RELIGION IN OAKLEY AREA
page.content: In our area we worship in{Oakley {Church Hall,Oakley Chapel and {Blairhall Gospel Hall.}There is mass every morning at Chapel.On Sunday there are 3 services.In the middle of mass there is communion.About 60 children attend mass.{Father McNay,the {village priest,}visits homes on the first Friday and the second Tuesday of each month to bring communion to people who are too old or too sick to go to church.In Oakley Church Hall there is a morning service every Sun- day.{Mr.Hall, the minster,}also tries to make about 20 home visits per week.Around 50 children attend Sunday School and there are 6 Sunday School teachers. Mr.Hall enjoys visiting schools where he takes a class each week.{The Gospel Hall in Blairhall}is run by lay preachers. There are meet- ings for adults and children.
